sentences.sContent: I have so many friends, but deep down, underneath, I have a fear of loneliness.
sentences.sCn: 我有这么多朋友，但是内心深处我还是有一种对孤独的恐惧。

words.tran: 单身的；独自的；寂寞的；人迹稀少的
孤独的人；不合群的动物

trans.tranOther: Loneliness is the unhappiness that is felt by someone because they do not have any friends or do not have anyone to talk to
